body.description: Small But Mighty Air Circulator Fan An air circulator is a must have appliance in your home for any season, keeping the air in motion and making the entire room more comfortable to live in. During Summer, use with air conditioner, will distribute the cold air faster, helps regulate the overall temperature of a room, saving time and energy. During Winter, use with heater, blow cold air towards the ceiling, warm air will circulate from top to bottom, help balance temperature in your home. Wall mount fan or table fan. 90 degree variable tilt head. 72ft long way air blowing. 8-inch air circulating turbo fan. 27dB super quiet operation. DIY installation for aromatherapy tablet. 3 fan speeds air flow with patent blades technology

During Summer, use with air conditioner, will distribute the cold air faster, helps regulate the overall temperature of a room, saving time and energy. During Winter, use with heater, blow cold air towards the ceiling, warm air will circulate from top to bottom, help balance temperature in your home. Wall mount fan or table fan. 90 degree variable tilt head. 72ft long way air blowing. 8-inch air circulating turbo fan. 27dB super quiet operation. DIY installation for aromatherapy tablet. 3 fan speeds air flow with patent blades technology

5 Blades Fans 5 blades can generate more wind because the distance between blades to blades is near, thus the wind it produces will be more consistent. What’s more, the more blades a fan has, the quieter it will be. 3 Speeds Adjustable Fans with 3 speeds settings, will generate suitable air movement as you need, and provide you with greater control over the temperature in your room. Fan with Fragrance Sponge Aromatherapy: Add 2-3 drops of essential oils (Not Included) into aroma pad under the cover, then fragrance will flow with air movements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This Fan is very quiet. I keep one under my desk at work and it keeps me cool without disturbing the work environment. I Keep a fan on in my bedroom, also partially for the ambient noise. This one is so quiet on low so I have to keep it on medium, which is still a reasonable Low pitched sound. It really moves a large volume of air for a small fan. I agree with reviews that say it doesn’t hold position and could use a better mechanism for keeping in place. It is the quietest fan I’ve ever owned, which was most important to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Own 3 and love them.
reviews.reviewText: The Tredy Air Circulator Fan is a small, quiet fan that is perfect for use in small spaces. It has three speeds and oscillates, so you can direct the airflow where you need it. The fan is also very energy-efficient, so you can use it without worrying about your energy bill.I have been using the Tredy Air Circulator Fan for a few weeks now, and I am very impressed with it. It is very quiet, even on the highest speed. I have used it in my bedroom at night, and it has not kept me awake. The fan is also very easy to use. There are just a few buttons on the front that you need to use to adjust the speed and oscillation.Overall, I am very happy with the Tredy Air Circulator Fan. It is a small, quiet, and energy-efficient fan that is perfect for use in small spaces. I would definitely recommend it to others.Here are some of the pros and cons of the Tredy Air Circulator Fan:**Pros:*** Small and compact* Quiet* Energy-efficient* Three speeds* Oscillates* Easy to use**Cons:*** Not very powerful* Not ideal for large spaces* Can be a bit wobblyOverall, I think the Tredy Air Circulator Fan is a great option for people who are looking for a small, quiet, and energy-efficient fan for use in small spaces. It is not the most powerful fan on the market, but it is perfect for personal use or to circulate air in a small room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet fan for small room
reviews.reviewText: This product is perfect for the small room I sleep in. I was looking for cooling and white noise and this definitely has both. It’s not loud and has a strong breeze on the lowest level so it’s quiet and cooling. Great buy for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tredy Air Circulator Fan,Small Quiet
reviews.reviewText: PROS: Small and Quiet just as advertised, inexpensive.CONS: Vertical adjustment tends to slip, could use a better design here to lock it in place.Overall I like it though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking and quiet
reviews.reviewText: Like the way this looks, rotates in any direction and low speed is quiet. So much so I can place it in my office and it not only keeps me cool, but also my equipment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Little Fan
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent little fan. I purchased one for my office and later another I put on the floor under my vanity at home. It's great to help cool off when I'm drying my hair right after the shower. Three settings, great tilt up and down and not noisy at all. Very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cools very well
reviews.reviewText: Small and does the job well. Cools you off and the room as well as the bigger ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a lot louder than I expected, especially for a fan its size, but overall the quality is pretty good and the airflow is nice.
